resources.string:
"- Stretch 1

"
" 1. Find a wall to stand in front 
" " 2. Place one foot in front of the other and slightly bend your front knee 
" " 3.While bending your front knee, keep your back knee straight with your heel on the ground and lean towards the wall
" " 4. Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds and alternate leds for a total of three repetitions
"
